channel.title: Social Dance Studio

item.title: Byron's Video Feed (click here for more)
item.description: Hello! Welcome to the Social Dance Studio video feed. You will find useful dance tips from some of our talented instructors on a wide...
item.dc:creator: Social Dance
item.content:encoded:
Hello!

Welcome to the Social Dance Studio video feed. You will find useful dance tips from some of our talented instructors on a wide range of dances. Most of the content will be free and you are welcome to donate to the dancers if you please. For people taking online lesson you will find your content here but locked only for your eyes only. Enjoy!

Salsa Warm-up for Thursday night classes

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WOe4HXHIBk8&list=PLOidPBdY800iS8qe4py7fFRAtnhJIzQ9X&index=3

Basic Rumba Pattern

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pV5nTn06ySQ&list=PLOidPBdY800iS8qe4py7fFRAtnhJIzQ9X&index=2

Basics/ Technique

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hyb6dIsXP6o&list=PLOidPBdY800iS8qe4py7fFRAtnhJIzQ9X&index=1

Basic West Coast Sequence

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QBzBoBhg0bU&list=PLOidPBdY800iS8qe4py7fFRAtnhJIzQ9X&index=6

Intermediate Swing Practice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W8F3JSAxL0k&list=PLOidPBdY800iS8qe4py7fFRAtnhJIzQ9X&index=4

Technique Leson

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wi0zfXrUd9g&list=PLOidPBdY800iS8qe4py7fFRAtnhJIzQ9X&index=5

Night Club Technique

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nhCwYu2TsTE&list=PLOidPBdY800iS8qe4py7fFRAtnhJIzQ9X&index=11

Hello!

Welcome to the Social Dance Studio video feed. You will find useful dance tips from some of our talented instructors on a wide range of dances. Most of the content will be free and you are welcome to donate to the dancers if you please. For people taking online lesson you will find your content here but locked only for your eyes only. Enjoy!
